name: Warren M. EVANS, Appellant v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION AND PAROLE, Appellee
name_abbreviation: Evans v. Pennsylvania Board of Probation

parties: Warren M. EVANS, Appellant v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION AND PAROLE, Appellee.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 15th day of November, 2004, the above captioned appeal is quashed for failure to file a brief.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
862 A.2d 583
Warren M. EVANS, Appellant v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION AND PAROLE, Appellee.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Nov. 15, 2004.
Reconsideration Denied Jan. 25, 2005.
